solution_line_template: The number of birthday presents that David found is {christmas_presents}/{ratio_christmas_to_birthday} = <<{christmas_presents}/{ratio_christmas_to_birthday}={birthday_presents}>>{birthday_presents}
For his birthday and Christmas, David found a total of {birthday_presents}+{christmas_presents} = <<{birthday_presents}+{christmas_presents}={total_presents}>>{total_presents} presents.
